regen.new_specification: The System must log when audit trail functionality is deactivated, including the user who performed the action and the timestamp

regen.absent_element: explicit distinction of capturing validly attempted violations
regen.new_specification: The System must be able to capture and store details of validly attempted violations of access attempts specifically.

regen.absent_element: capturing valid but technically failed access attempts
regen.new_specification: The System must be able to capture and store technically failed valid access attempts for traceability and forensic investigation.

label: The System must be able to capture and store violations of cases where violations can validly be attempted.
absence: action of capturing and storing violations of cases where violations can validly be attempted
